augBlueprint.name: ROCK_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Rock Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Superior hull armor provides a 15 percent chance to negate incoming hull damage (hit systems will still be damaged).

changelog.entry: Enemy Crystal ships now have Crystal Vengeance installed

augBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_SHARDS
augBlueprint.title: Crystal Vengeance
augBlueprint.desc: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 50 percent chance to break off a shard that flies at your enemy and deals 2 damage piercing 1 layer of shields.

augBlueprint.name: ENERGY_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Zoltan Shield
augBlueprint.desc: An unexplained technology creates this nearly impenetrable shield. Only the energy outburst from an FTL engine is powerful enough to recharge it.

changelog.entry: Engi Med-Bot Dispersal scrap cost 60 to 40

augBlueprint.name: NANO_MEDBAY
augBlueprint.title: Engi Med-bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Engi nano med-bots heal the crew outside of the med-bay (at a reduced speed).

changelog.entry: Slug Repair Gel scrap cost 60 to 30

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Slug Repair Gel
augBlueprint.desc: Slug ships excrete a thick gel that automatically repairs any hull breaches.

augBlueprint.name: CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Mantis Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Your crew's movement speed is increased by 25 percent.

changelog.entry: Drone Reactor Booster scrap cost 50 to 30
Drone Reactor Booster speed modifier 1.25 to 3

augBlueprint.name: DRONE_SPEED
augBlueprint.title: Drone Reactor Booster
augBlueprint.desc: Your shipboard drones have their movement speed TRIPLED. Whoosh!

augBlueprint.name: SYSTEM_CASING
augBlueprint.title: Pavonian System Casing
augBlueprint.desc: All ship systems have additional plating that provides a 25 percent chance to negate damage when hit (hull will still be damaged)

changelog.entry: Reverse Ion Field scrap cost 45 to 30

augBlueprint.name: ION_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Reverse Ion Field
augBlueprint.desc: Protects your ship from ion damage, giving a 50 percent chance to negate it entirely.

augBlueprint.name: CLOAK_FIRE
augBlueprint.title: Stealth Weapons
augBlueprint.desc: Prevents your weapon fire from disrupting your cloak, allowing you to shoot at will while cloaked.

changelog.entry: Repair Arm made exclusive to new race
Repair Arm scrap reward decrease from 0.15 to 0.1

augBlueprint.name: REPAIR_ARM
augBlueprint.title: Lizard Repair Mold
augBlueprint.desc: The mold living on ship exterior can repair hull at the cost of 10 percent of all scrap collected. Does not decrease scrap rewards if the hull is at excellent condition.

changelog.entry: Scrap Recovery Arm made unavailable in stores or loot (Lanius ships start with it)

augBlueprint.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR
augBlueprint.title: Lanius Metal Extractor
augBlueprint.desc: Allows the ship to collect 15 percent more scrap from any source.

changelog.entry: Long-Ranged Scanners made exclusive to new race

augBlueprint.name: ADV_SCANNERS
augBlueprint.title: Aquarian Pelengator
augBlueprint.desc: Adds additional info about nearby beacons on the star map.

augBlueprint.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN
augBlueprint.title: Automated Re-loader
augBlueprint.desc: Weapons charge 10 percent faster.

changelog.entry: Shield Recharge Booster scrap cost 45 to 40

augBlueprint.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE
augBlueprint.title: Shield Charge Booster
augBlueprint.desc: Boosts the ship's shield recharge rate by 15 percent.

augBlueprint.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE
augBlueprint.title: Weapon Pre-igniter
augBlueprint.desc: Weapons are made immediately available after an FTL jump.

changelog.entry: FTL Recharge Booster scrap cost 50 to 30

augBlueprint.name: FTL_BOOSTER
augBlueprint.title: FTL Recharge Booster
augBlueprint.desc: The ship's FTL Drive powers up 50 percent faster.

changelog.entry: Adv. FTL Navigation scrap cost 50 to 40
Adv. FTL Navigation allows to jump to any beacon in the sector instead of any previously visited beacon.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JUMPER_UNIVERSAL
augBlueprint.title: Universal FTL Navigation
augBlueprint.desc: Allows the ship to jump to any beacon in the sector at no additional cost.

changelog.entry: Drone Recovery Arm scrap cost 50 to 40

augBlueprint.name: DRONE_RECOVERY
augBlueprint.title: Drone Recovery Arm
augBlueprint.desc: Non-destroyed drones will be retrieved when jumping, allowing their parts to be reused.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: FTL Jammer
augBlueprint.desc: Scramble enemy ships' FTL computers, doubling the time it takes for them to jump.

augBlueprint.name: STASIS_POD
augBlueprint.title: Damaged Stasis Pod
augBlueprint.desc: This bizarre alien artifact appears to be barely operational. It has no practical function but perhaps someone can repair it.

augBlueprint.name: O2_MASKS
augBlueprint.title: Emergency Respirators
augBlueprint.desc: Crew take half damage from low oxygen.

augBlueprint.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Explosive Replicator
augBlueprint.desc: Missile based weapons have a 50 percent chance of not using a missile.

changelog.entry: Fire Suppression extinguishing speed increased by 80% (1.5x speed of human)

augBlueprint.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS
augBlueprint.title: Fire Suppression
augBlueprint.desc: Automatically put out fires throughout the ship.

augBlueprint.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION
augBlueprint.title: Distraction Buoys
augBlueprint.desc: Leaves a false signal at sector start to delay Rebels 1 jump.

augBlueprint.name: TELEPORT_HEAL
augBlueprint.title: Reconstructive Teleport
augBlueprint.desc: Crew gets fully healed by teleportation.

changelog.entry: Battery Charger cooldown 10 sec to 5 sec

augBlueprint.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER
augBlueprint.title: Battery Charger
augBlueprint.desc: Backup Battery's lock time is 4 times shorter (5 seconds instead of 20).

augBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER
augBlueprint.title: Defense Scrambler
augBlueprint.desc: Prevents enemy defense drones from targeting anything.

augBlueprint.name: BACKUP_DNA
augBlueprint.title: Backup DNA Bank
augBlueprint.desc: Your crew is safe in clone storage even if the system is off or broken.

augBlueprint.name: HACKING_STUN
augBlueprint.title: Hacking Stun
augBlueprint.desc: All crew inside a room during a Hacking Pulse will be stunned for the duration.

augBlueprint.name: LIFE_SCANNER
augBlueprint.title: Lifeform Scanner
augBlueprint.desc: Detects the location of any life forms, even when sensors don't function.

changelog.entry: Zoltan Shield Bypass scrap cost 55 to 40

augBlueprint.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS
augBlueprint.title: Zoltan Shield Bypass
augBlueprint.desc: Allows crew/bomb teleportation and mind control to work through Super Shields.

changelog.entry: New Nanobot Defense System augmentation (deals damage to boarders on your ship)

augBlueprint.name: NANOBOT_DEFENSE_SYSTEM
augBlueprint.title: Nanobot Defense System
augBlueprint.desc: Boarders take damage over time on your ship.

changelog.entry: New Missile Recycler augmentation (additional 2 missiles for each defeated ship)

augBlueprint.name: MISSILE_RECYCLER
augBlueprint.title: Missile Recycler
augBlueprint.desc: Recycles two additional missiles from each destroyed or captured ship.

changelog.entry: New Engine Disabler augmentation (limits enemy engines to 1)

augBlueprint.name: ENGINE_DISABLER
augBlueprint.title: Engine Disabler
augBlueprint.desc: Lowers enemy evasion by limiting engine power to a minimum.

augBlueprint.name: GREENHOUSE
augBlueprint.title: Orchid Greenhouse
augBlueprint.desc: After a long-range FTL jump (at the start of each sector), replenishes your crew with one newly grown Orchid.
